properties.address: North Thoresby Village Hall, Grimsby, South Humberside DN36 5QL
properties.description: Sociable Soup The 3rd Tuesday of every month. 12 – 2.00 at North Thoresby Village Hall, DN36 5QL. Choice of 2 soups Bread rolls At least 2 cakes Tea and Coffee Gluten Free and vegetarian catered for. If you have any other dietary requirements please let me know and I will try and accommodate you. All welcome – no cost. No Booking necessary. Come and join our friendly guests in a warm space – All welcome from North Thoresby and surrounding villages. If you have a friend, neighbour or relative that would like a take-away as they are unable to attend please come and collect it for them. Tuesday 19th November 2024 Tuesday 17th December 2024 Tuesday 21st January 2025 Tuesday 18th February 2025 Tuesday 18th March 2025 Any new volunteers are welcome. Contact Heather 01472 841127.
properties.title: Sociable Soup - North Thoresby Village Hall

properties.address: Springs Church c/o The Rock Foundation, Caistor, Caistor, Lincolnshire LN7 6RJ
properties.description: Open from 07/11/2022 and continuing We have a room with drinks, toast and fruit etc throughout the session. Bring a book or craft if you wish- or just yourself for a friendly chat. Jigsaw and puzzles available- craft activity on certain Mondays.
properties.title: Springs Church Lincolnshire
